page.title: 15TOURISM SURVEY (3)
page.content: The next question in the survey dealt with the methods of{transport. 62 used the bus service, 47 came by car, 16 walked, 8 by coach, 1 by taxi and 1 by bicycle. Most visitors were happy with the bus services and parking facilities but local residents were less satisfied. People were asked about{sports {facilities}in the area. The greatest number came to play golf. The second most popular activity was swimming, then wind-surfing, walking in the park, drinking in the public houses and water-skiing. {Grouville Bay}was generally praised for its sandy beach, safe swimming and its facilities e.g.WCs, parking, cafes and kiosks. The locals preferred{Arch- {irondel}as there are fewer visitors. The majority of visitors had enjoyed their stay and would like to return.
